title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document detailed requirements for the InnovationIncubator platform, including features, user roles, workflows, and integration with existing systems.

title: Design System Architecture - RFC Review
description: Design the overall system architecture for the InnovationIncubator project, including components, data flow, technology stack, and infrastructure requirements. Consider scalability, maintainability, security aspects, and provide a high-level overview and detailed component diagrams. This RFC is open for discussion and suggestions.

title: Design User Interface and Experience (UI/UX)
description: Design the user interface and user experience for the InnovationIncubator platform. This includes wireframes, mockups, prototypes, accessibility considerations, and high-fidelity visual design elements. Collaborate with stakeholders to ensure the design aligns with project goals and meets user needs.
dependencies: Conduct User Research and Persona Analysis

title: Set up Development Environment
description: Configure the development environment, including version control, build tools, and continuous integration/deployment pipelines.

title: Design Database Schema
description: Design the database schema to store and manage innovation initiatives, user data, roles and permissions, and other relevant information. Consider scalability, security, and performance requirements. Also, ensure that the design is modular, extensible, and adheres to best practices for data modeling.

title: Implement Backend Services
description: Develop and implement backend services for the platform, including APIs, business logic, and integration with other systems.

title: Implement Frontend Components
description: Develop and implement frontend components for the platform, including user interfaces, navigation, and interactions.

title: Implement Comprehensive Security Measures
description: Implement robust security measures for the platform, including multi-factor authentication, role-based access control, data encryption at rest and in transit, regular vulnerability testing, and secure coding practices.

title: Write Documentation
description: Write comprehensive documentation for the platform, including user guides, developer guides, and API documentation.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Perform thorough testing and quality assurance for the platform, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Deploy and Monitor Platform
description: Deploy the InnovationIncubator platform to production environments, and set up monitoring and logging systems.
